games.title: Games
games.description: Competitive by nature, I love strategy and FPS games. Dota 2 and Counter Strike are my favorites!

sports.title: Sports
sports.description: I believe sports teach discipline and overcoming. Cruzeiro fan and occasional bettor in my free time!

music.title: Music
music.description: My playlist is a fusion of styles, from rock to sertanejo, I love appreciating good music.

popCulture.title: Pop culture
popCulture.description: Straight from Ravenclaw, I'm a fan of superheroes, anime and other sagas from the pop multiverse.
